title: Does Shaco even need Hunter's Machete?
body:
Ive been maining Shaco for a while now and Ive been great at him but ever since the changes to the jungle Ive been buying the jungle items like {{item:3713}} and {{item:3706}} for the smite upgrades. But I feel like this just slows down Shaco's progression in game and his assassin potential goes down the drain. I barely manage to buy {{item:3077}}  11 mins in. 
What do you guys think?

replies.body: i pref to rush the rangers trailblazer, stun aoe, heals for 15% OF MISSING HEALTH and MANA when used on jg camps, which can be a lifesaver when invading or getting counterjungled, if the enemy is a squishy jglr or travels a predictable route it is well worth getting, then rush tiamat/boots, but if i get 2 succesful ganks off before the first b, then i would usually just rush for the tiamat
I just go stalker's blade > tiamat > boots > hydra > warrior enchantment > berserker's greaves
just get the first part of w/e jungle item then go pick axe. If you do it correctly u can get 3 ganks off b4 having to back and buy both
You need Stalker's Blade, it provides the extra CC as his E doesn't do much tbh.
